title: specialized equipment
extract: Definition of specialized. 1 : characterized by or exhibiting biological specialization especially : highly differentiated especially in a particular direction or for a particular end. 2 : designed, trained, or fitted for one particular purpose or occupation specialized personnel.
extract_html: Definition of specialized. 1 : characterized by or exhibiting biological specialization especially : highly differentiated especially in a particular direction or for a particular end. 2 : designed, trained, or fitted for one particular purpose or occupation specialized personnel.
